title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 §§ 1647-5.3 - Disbursements from reserve fund
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 §§ 1647-5.3 - Disbursements from reserve fund

State Regulations

Since only occasional disbursements will be made from
the reserve fund, it will be unnecessary to have separate reserve fund vouchers
and checks printed. In lieu thereof, administration fund vouchers and checks
may be adapted for use in making reserve fund disbursement by striking out the
words "Administration Fund" and substituting therefor the words "Reserve

Fund". Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
§§
1647-5.3

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
